doc.name: remove
doc.summary: Deletes a group from a specified card.

description.overview: Use the remove command to remove a group from a card without removing it from the stack.

parameter.name: group
parameter.description: The group is a reference to any group that is on the specified card.

parameter.name: card
parameter.description: The card is any card reference.

description.comments:
The remove command removes a group from a card, without deleting it.
Only top-level groups may be removed from cards; an attempt to remove a nested group from a card throws an error.
Removing a group from a card automatically sets the sharedBehavior property of the group to true.
